Reviews.Title: You can't have it all but the cellphone is great.
Reviews.Author: G. C. Fabio
Reviews.Content: Hey,I bought this cellphone to replace my old Omnia 2 (WinMo 6.5).There are a few pros that really make me happy on this cellphone:- HTC Sense:HTC interface rocks. I'm really impressed with the people app and all integration it does with your app. It amazed even some friends that has others brands such as Galaxy S2- dual core:It is not fast as a S2 but it won't let you down.- buildLooks good. Well constructed, HTC spent some money in good materials here.- ScreenIt is bright, colors seems to have the right colors (Galaxy colors looks green to me) and it is readable at sunlight (you can make a call, but it is not comfortable to read a message)What is not so good:- WeightIt is heavy: 170 grams is heavy compared to the 111 from galaxy s2 and also heavy compared to my old phone- BatteryThis really limits your cellphone. In fact this is not something related only to HTC EVO, but is something that impacts ALL smartphones. If you want it full power, it'll not last 6 hours.I definitely was going to rate this phone as 3 stars, but after talk with some friends I notice this is a common issue among smartphone users, so I spent some time testing configurations on my device to save some battery. right now. It can make 2-3 days "saving" battery or 1 day of hard usage.So, here is the thing.Sync: I did several tests... data transfers over 3G drains your battery.Take some time and configure it right. Do you really need to have your mail box being checked each 15 minutes? I really advice you to reduce or disable most of syncs.wifi:Check if there is wifi available, turn your Wifi on. It consumes less battery.GPS:"GPS satellites" drains your battery a lot.disable "GPS satellites" unless you are going to use your HTC as a GPS navigator. Use wireless networks instead. It is enough for most of your applications and will not eat your battery.If possible think about change you network settings from WCDMA and GSM to only GSM specially if you know you'll not be using data transfers.Rgds

Reviews.Title: It works fine. But only got Edge, not 3G or above.
Reviews.Author: J. Liu
Reviews.Content: All features work great, the only thing that below my expectation is I can only get 2G data rate out of it.I believed it is 3G+ capable, but I never got 3G data, I have to switch back to my old phone with Windows Phone 6.5to get higher data rate.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Neutronstar "NB"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace my Nokia N8, a phone which despite its gorgeous and sturdy hardware frustrated me to no end. Let's get this over with shall we,I properly hate the 3d feature. It feels like a gimmick and destroys the battery life. However, to account for 3d's battery sucking nature,the phone comes with a greater capacity battery than the similarly specced htc sensation. Because of my abhorrence towards the 3d camera, the phone, unlike my friend's sensation, easily gets through a day of moderate usage(awesome side effect). The only gripe I have is regarding the hardware aspects of the phone, mainly the ergonomics and the display. Talking of the former, the ergonomics of the phone could have been much better. The biggest culprit here is the camera key, which juts out from the side. The design of the camera key leads to it pressing into the skin and often getting pressed accidentally.Putting a case on the phone, however, negates this problem. The display, while of qHd resolution, has very bad viewing angles. Despite saying this, I would take this display over pentile matrix displays like those of the atrix's and the droid razr's every-time.

Reviews.Title: it is not an unlocked phone!
Reviews.Author: Danny Jimenez Vega
Reviews.Content: It was a joke! This phone needs a contract of spring, we can not use it, it is not an unlocked phone! we are hope the refound of the money!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto.
Reviews.Author: Valero Angel Carlos Felipe "Mi Cuenta"
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, muy rapido, android es lo mejor, procesador dual core 1,2, trae la memoria 8 gb en SD y 4GB interna, 2 camara 5.0 mp traseras y una delantera de 1.3mp, la pantalla realmente en 3D, la nitidez de la pantalla mejor que el Samsung Galaxy SII, facil de manejar, miles de programas a traves del Play Google.ATENCION CON LAS BANDAS: Este modelo X515m es europeo, para Latinoamerica requiere las Bandas HSDPA 900 / 1900 / 2100 para el uso de 3G, aqui en Venezuela solo sirve con Digitel que tiene banda 900.

Reviews.Title: The Incredible phone
Reviews.Author: oktay
Reviews.Content: This phone is really awesome. I am very happy to choose this phone. 3D pictures and videos will be unbelievable in my 3D TV.Thanks.....

Reviews.Title: HTC 3D rocks !!!!
Reviews.Author: Nakul
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with HTC phone and its really make me happy. This phone has everything that any ideal phone should have. The best feature is 3D. The 3D experience is really far beyond my expectation!!.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Hania
Reviews.Content: I love htc and everything for htc. This phone is absolutely amazing. The 3G camera is it's exclusive feature. I'm having so much fun getting to know it. I will always buy htc.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Mohamed H.
Reviews.Content: I loved every thing about this phone except one thing , the battery !Super mega lame battery that can not handle a medium daily use , other than that it is still a great phone with amazing  3D camera

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy.
Reviews.Author: M. Hajar "ChicagoBearsFan"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone and as expected. The seller "FGS" delivered it on time and in factory package.Three disappointments I have:1- I can't download my free 3D movie if I'm outside the States.2- Internal phone memory is low after few months of using. So I have to keep freeing-up space every now and then.3- The battery time is still short, even if I killed/stopped most running Apps. So I kept chargers in every place.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Salazar
Reviews.Content: I have this cell phone for over a year and 4 months and still working the same way that when it was new.Try to watch Avatar 3d, woow it looks awesome.I have no regrets of buying it. By far one of the best cell phones ever.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Edward Arias
Reviews.Content: Es un telefono de alta calidad, incluso la marca deberia promocionarse más pues es incluso mucho mejor que los dos lideres en el mercado!!!

Reviews.Title: Broke in 10 months.
Reviews.Author: Cyber Andy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone 10 months ago and suddenly last week the bottom portion of the screen quit working. I went to have it repaired (which in itself was annoying as its not that old..) and the repairman told me it was a hardware issue and I'd have to buy a whole new phone! About 6 months into owning it the power cord which has a horrid design began splitting. I'm not sure if I happen to get extremely unlucky or if many of these reviews were written by people who didn't bother coming back to update their troubles after the expiration of Amazon's return, but I've got a $400 dollar coaster (that god I didn't pay 900 like it costs now..) DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Montell
Reviews.Content: El producto llegó en perfecto estado y es de buena calidad, lo recomiendo, el envío llegó a tiempo según lo acordado

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: agustin
Reviews.Content: it was really excellent!! i love it. this is what im looking for. now i can enjoy it! thank you.

Reviews.Title: Excelenteeeee!!!
Reviews.Author: engelberth
Reviews.Content: esto es Excelente telefono lo recomiendo 100% desde venezuela.... lo unico es que es sonido es pobre y la bateria. y ahora se me acaba de actualizar para android 4.0.3

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: So i bought his phone for my girlfriend a couple weeks ago, fast delivery for me here in Trinidad (didn't expect that, but a welcome surprise), waited a while to post a review but i gotta say, i really like this phone, from it's awesome HTC Sense user interface to it's sturdy feel when it's in your hand...i have no complaints, runs apps smoothly with no lags, touch screen is very responsive, games are great , the 3D is a wonderful concept that has captured a lot of friends, they're always comparing to the HTC Sensation or Galaxy S11, but I'll take this phone any day. My only regret is not buying one for myself, now I'm gonna have to order another..

Reviews.Title: brilliant
Reviews.Author: germanohenz
Reviews.Content: I received this phone 4 days ago and it's excelent.The big display and the resolution are great.The dual core processor and the RAM make it runs smoothly.Working great in Brazil

Reviews.Title: fail
Reviews.Author: Joey Loreto Quiros "JLoreto"
Reviews.Content: this phone has 1900 3G? because in the descripcion it say so but in the box it doesnt.please respond

Reviews.Title: It works great
Reviews.Author: luink
Reviews.Content: I bought it from Yellow Deals, through Amazon.com. It was originally intended to work in Czech Republic, and it only has european english capabilities (I needed to install an application from android market to get other languages like spanish). After that, it simply works amazingly smooth, super fast response. 3D Camera is really good despite being 2 megapixels (not recommended to take photos in quick motion). 2D pictures with 5 megapixels are awesome (720p). Its speakers are not that good, but I guess it is because it must save battery life as much as possible.You definitely feel its dual core processor. It runs really heavy 3d games easyly and smoothly.All in all, I love it. I do recommend you to get this Smartphone.PD. When 3D photo watching does not work, simply restart the device (it hardly ever happens.

Reviews.Title: i LOVE THIS PHONE THIS PHONE IS THE BEST PHONE EVVER HTC HAS MADE THIS PHONE IS BEST FOR EVERYTHING
Reviews.Author: pink
Reviews.Content: BETTER THAN ANY IPHONE BLACKBERRY NOKIA LG SAMSUNG OR ANY OTHER BEST PHONE THIS PHONE IS THE BEST PHONE EVVER HTC HAS MADE THIS PHONE IS BEST FOR EVERYTHING

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: jos
Reviews.Content: nice device it was what i wanted. is easy to know the aplications and it has a lot of utilities

Reviews.Title: htc x515m evo 3D
Reviews.Author: deo
Reviews.Content: I got this product on time, package not open when its irrived.I love the htc evo 3D than my old nokia n97mini.The 3D pictures is like a real and live.

Reviews.Title: Just right now
Reviews.Author: Igor
Reviews.Content: This is what I wanted for myself. Many praise the iPhone 4, but in my opinion, the best choice HTC evo 3D.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900. HSDPA 900 / 1900 / 2100
1.2 GHz dual-core processor, Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread), 1 GB storage, 1 GB RAM, Card Slot - microSD, up to 32GB
Primary Camera: 5 MP, autofocus, dual-LED flash. 1.3 Megapixel Secondary Camera. Video: 1080p@24fps (2D), 720p@30fps (3D)
Display: 3D S-LCD capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors; Size: 4.3 inches. Display Features: Multi-touch input method, Touch-sensitive controls, Accelerometer sensor for UI auto-rotate, Proximity sensor for auto turn-off, Gyro sensor, HTC Sense UI
Additional Features: Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi hotspot, Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP, EDR, Stereo FM radio with RDS, GPS with A-GPS support, HDMI port, Document viewer/editor, 3.5mm jack, Talk time: Up to 7 h 30 min
ProductInfo.Name: HTC X515M EVO 3D Unlocked Android Smartphone with 3D Camera, Dual-Core Processor, Wi-Fi, GPS
